about_the_game:
How to download the English version:


To download the English version, please follow these steps:
Open Steam and log in to your account.
Go to the "Library" tab at the top of the screen.
Locate the game you want to download in English.
Right-click on the game and select "Properties" from the dropdown menu.
In the Properties window, go to the "General" tab.
Choose "English" from the Language dropdown menu.
Click on "Close" to save the changes.
Steam will then begin downloading the English version of the game. Please wait for the download to complete before launching the game.
